content: is it worth having direct links to internal API, especially since readers of the guide would have local docs
should we not rather encourage users to search their local docs to explore this API, with full path (think rustc::ty::Ty)
I ask because the links constantly break, and it feels laborious fixing them, and also slow to review PRs updating them
Yes, part of the reason we have so many links is so that we know when things break
This allows us to keep up with changes
